name: E.C.F - Extreme Conditions Farming
description:
You need to feed your family and not let them starve. Grow crops, convert them to seeds or sell (for no reason)

P.S. I was going to make it into survival game where you need to protect your crops from extreme weather, but couldn't finish it on time.

Maybe I will finish it for Jam submission

Controls:

  • Left Mouse: action
  • Right Mouse: camera movement
  • Escape: menu
